summary: This is a memorandum from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) documenting a voluntary interview with Mark Epstein on September 22, 2021, regarding the death of his brother, Jeffrey Epstein, while in BOP custody. Mark Epstein provided information and later sent emails containing autopsy pictures. The document is part of an official OIG investigation into the circumstances surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death.

keyFacts: Mark Epstein voluntarily met with the DOJ OIG to provide information he had obtained relating to his brother Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The interview was conducted as part of an official OIG investigation into the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
Mark Epstein sent emails containing pictures from Jeffrey Epstein's autopsy to the Special Agent following the interview.
Jeffrey Epstein was housed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York in July and August 2019 prior to his death.
The interview was recorded and transcribed, and the recording was saved separately due to its large file size.
